reasoning_bullet_points: Insider sale of $3.89M (Director Aggarwal) acted as a negative sentiment trigger, despite being a pre-planned 10b5-1 transaction.
Structural headwinds from Autonomous Vehicle competition (Waymo reaching 14M rides, Tesla robotaxi threat) are causing a valuation compression.
Technical breakdown: Price shattered the 20-day and 50-day SMAs; RSI at 35 indicates momentum is bearish but not yet at capitulation levels.
Valuation concerns: High P/E (~51x) leaves the stock vulnerable to multiple contraction amidst decelerating growth guidance.
Major support lies lower at the 200-day SMA ($16.53), suggesting further downside potential before a durable bottom.
